description: man half length, turned left and looking out at viewer; wearing ruff and cloak with many small buttons on front; holding artist's pallet in PLhand and brush in PR hand; before an open window with horse and rider, tents and a city visible in distance; easel to his left with hoof and rear leg of horse on canvas
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black on sheild: PARS / III / Henr. bondius(?) / excudit / cum / privil  |  on sheet below image in black: IOANNIS STRADANUS, BRUGENS. PICT. / four lines Latin: Stradano Belga .../.../.../..progenuere Brugae  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-439
title: Johannes Stradanus, Brugens
